website_summaries.verdict: These sturdy scented trash bags are the perfect way to reduce odor in your kitchen and home.
pros: Bags boast the fresh scent of Febreze to neutralize odor
Bags hold up to 13 gallons of trash and come in a 110-pack, making them a stellar value
Bags are sturdy and stretch to accommodate a heavy load
cons: Scent may be overpowering for small spaces

customer_reviews.title: Appallingly strong odor - I'm throwing these bags away because they are wildly over-treated with febreze perfume
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god the perfume. When I bought these I didn't begin to imagine that these things would UTTERLY REEK of sick smelling perfume. After putting two bags into trash cans in my kitchen (hidden behind cupboard doors no less) the entire house smells of sickly sweet febreeze. It's practically comic how over-the-top the chemical treatment is here. Yuck. I seriously have come back to amazon today to buy new trash bags into which to throw these awful, awful trash bags. Cripes, just smelling my hands 20 minutes after putting the bags in, and the smell is so powerful. Perhaps this is a manufacturing error...???!!!?! YUCK!
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Conelly

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong order like people say
customer_reviews.text: This bag always held up for me. Lasted me two months. I decided to go with the fragrance kind. Same bag everything just febreze fragrance and it's NOT at all overwhelming like others are saying. I read the reviews before I bought it and I'm like uh that's not a bad thing to have your trash not smelling like trash DUH, anyhow it's not even strong like they claim. I'm actually disappointed that it isn't a strong headache smell like people claim lol. It doesn't mask the whole smell of the trash can because afterall it's trash but it sure does do more than a regular unscented bag. I'd say by 75%. Good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmïne

customer_reviews.title: Just plain garbage....
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the fact that the bags were splitting at the seams & I had trash everywhere. It was just not one or two bags, nor from just one roll, but the majority of the bags and from both rolls.... Unable to return to Amazon because I surpassed my “window” on returns. Now I have a box full of useless trash bags.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Febreze smell is overpowering
customer_reviews.text: Note: I am not super sensitive to smells! Though these trash bags are sturdy, the Febreze smell is overpowering. I just moved the garbage can with the bag out to the front porch to air out, and took an aspirin as the smell has given me a raging headache. I don't want to air out the other 109 left in the box and I regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L. Gardetto

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I have a been using these bags for years. My last several pkgs of these are TERRIBLE. They split along the seams on both sides, spilling garbage all over. I usually purchase the 80 quantity and they were stronger, no issues. I switched to the 110 pkg and they SUCK! I have to triple up bags, thus costing more money. Don't buy this item!
customer_reviews.author: AME139

customer_reviews.title: the scent is overwhelming terrible
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 boxes, that 330 bags when they were on sale a few months ago. Structurally, the bags are awesome. But - the scent is overwhelming terrible. We thought the box was defective, so opened another box and almost fell over from the fumes. We ended up giving them to the Human Society - but honestly I think they will end up tossing them out. Love the bags, but this smell is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: theMezz

customer_reviews.title: Trash bags smell like dirty diapers!
customer_reviews.text: We put in a fresh bag and all day long I was telling my husband he needed to take the trash out because the trash stunk so bad like a dirty diaper! We couldn't figure it out and he said he could smell it too. It was so nasty! When he went to take out the trash he realize it is the scent of the trash bags!! The scent smells exactly like a dirty diaper!! So gross! It is not Febreze fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J.

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this same box of trash bags for the last two years. I have always gotten Glad Force Flex white bags. I just opened my latest box and the bags are different. They are grey and thin. I figured I’d still use them. One bag in and now the contents are strewn about my yard because the bag split heading to the trash. These are useless and I am beyond my return window so I’m stuck with them. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Something changed - Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased this product and was very happy with it, however on my recent purchase I noticed something was different with the bags. Previously the inside was white and now it was black and the material looked thinner. I've used a few bags now and most of them ripped near the top when removing from the trash can. Either they are making these cheaper/weaker now or I got a defective package. Either way, very disappointed with the poor strength quality on these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits tall cans. Ha ha ha ha ha ha... that's funny
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this brand because it was cheaper. And now I know why it's cheaper... It is not the same size as the 13 gallon bags I used before. These bags seem much smaller, and they do not fit my trash can... The straps break when you tie the bag, and I'm always weary about the bag breaking as it stretches to its maximum when I pull it out of the trash can. Unfortunately, these bags may end up in the trash when I get the brand I like again.
customer_reviews.author: Mathias Duoos

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were the bags we usually buy in store. When Covid-19 hit our state and we were put on stay at home orders, I ordered these bags here. They’re like a really cheap version of the glad flex we usually buy. Most bags we end up having to double up because they rip so easily. The scent to cover up the trash smell is super strong (and unpleasant) when the bags are first inserted but as the trash sits the smell disappears and doesn’t cover the smell of trash! 🤦🏻‍♀️ I’m going to stick to buying these in stores once we’re through this box.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not "tall" at all.  Odd shape.
customer_reviews.text: These are not tall kitchen bags. They are short and square. They do not fit in any normal "tall" kitchen garbage can. I do not have an unusual shaped can. These bags are just no good and do not match the description. I took them to work to use in our short waste baskets under our desks since I can not use at home. They work for small/short waste baskets, Not tall/normal kitchen waste bins.
customer_reviews.author: C J M

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy Glad, be happy
customer_reviews.text: Used to love Glad bags. Now they are made super crappy. Bag not stretched full, at best a half bag. Ripped around top where handles go thru the top rim. While trying to fix that rip, the corner of a half gallon milk carton ripped the side. Ended up just putting this bag into a second bag. Not impressed with this new styling.
customer_reviews.author: Tony White

customer_reviews.title: Smell is strong
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags, but not the smell; in our small kitchen it's too strong. I feel it's a more a flowery perfume smell than anything "fresh clean" as the description says. When I think of "fresh clean" I imagine how wonderful clean laundry smells. When I think of how the flowery perfume smell it's when the lady or guy passes you and you say "wooo, did they use the whole bottle??" I'll go back to the Great Value bags at Walmart with vanilla scent. They're more easy on the nose, closer to "fresh clean", and they don't linger in the room for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Rune Haugland

customer_reviews.title: After decades, changing to a different brand
customer_reviews.text: After decades of using Glad bags it's time to find a new brand. What's the logic behind making the old style bags smaller, then manufacturing them so that they supposedly stretch out to the same old size? They both hold 13 gallons, no? In the meantime, broken nails trying to stretch them over the opening of my kitchen garbage can because the bag's opening is smaller. Also, the tie strings break free from their sleeves when I try to tie them shut. This is a case of gilding the lily. They were perfectly fine before the so-called force-flex improvement. Now, they're awful.
customer_reviews.author: TheBear

customer_reviews.title: Rips all the time!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are the worst. I should've returned them when I saw they were too short for my kitchen can but I decided to stick it out with them and UGH. The scent is super strong and I don't think they really cover up the smell, its a mix of trash smell and their scent. These bags also rip almost every time! Either as Im trying to empty the can or somewhere in the middle of the bag after I take it out. Will NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PawPatroller

customer_reviews.title: What Happened to the White Bags Like on Front of the Box
customer_reviews.text: I simply want white flex garbage bags. I ordered a box and the pic on front of box was white. When I got them, they are gray on outside and black on the inside. I do not want gray and black. I contacted for return. Amazon sent me replacement. Again, gray and black. Where are the white flex bags pictured on the box. I have two trash cans located in dimmer lit places and with black liners, you cannot see where to throw the trash and every one misses it so I end up picking up the garbage. One more time Amazon, where are the white flex garbage bags??
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: The new bags are awful...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Glad kitchen trash bags for years. They’ve changed the bags from white and sturdy to a thin grey bag that tears easily. I now have to use two bags in the trash can in order to get the trash out without getting the bag tearing and getting trash everywhere. These bags are awful. In an effort to save money by making the bags thinner they have lost all structure and durability in them. Completely wrong way to go here. I cannot recommend these bags. Please don’t waste your money, I’m strongly disappointed in Glad, a company I have trusted for years.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanBlonde

customer_reviews.title: don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: The worst bags ever. They only go 2/3 of the way down in a 13 gal trashcan and the LEAK. I am having to double and on occasion triple bag the garbage when i take it out of the barrel. I am so sorry I bought these. Don't believe the hype. I am disable and have a housekeeper come in once a week. I now have stains on my floor from the bags leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Annaliese

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had read previous reviews
customer_reviews.text: Oof! Do these trash bags STINK. (odd, b/c the previous version of these very same bags that I bought prior did not smell this strongly). It's a very cloying odor, even when the trash bag is inside your trash receptacle. The bags are strong and do their job, even if the drawstring doesn't completely close the bag sometimes. If you are sensitive to strong perfume-y scents I would suggest you don't buy these. I am regretting doing so...
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: APPALLING SMELL, ABSOLUTELY HIDEOUS
customer_reviews.text: If you are sensitive to scents, this is NOT the product for you!!! The durability and strength of these garbage bags are great. But their Nasty smell is enough to never purchase them again. Not sure if the smell is due to the "Odor Shield" or what exactly. But, I can definitely see how this chemical smell would overpower any trash or rotting food it may contain inside. It also states "Fabreze Freshness" on the box. I'm familiar with that scent and the only smell I detect is that horrible chemical smell. I am baffled at how this product ever pass consumer testing.
customer_reviews.author: SuperEx

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED/AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: I typically buy the Glad ForceFlex bags, which are FABULOUS! These were on sale for a price I couldn't pass up. BIG MISTAKE! They tear easily, don't fully fill up our trash can, and they smell like they dumped a gallon of Febreze on each one. We are having to use 2 at a time, which makes the smell worse, but at least we will get rid of them faster. BTW, we like and use Febreze as well. The ONLY reason it gets 2 stars is because they were on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Deloris P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT what they used to be!!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these before when they were solid white. They were tough as leather, you could stuff them full and never rip them. I would take out the trash once a week. But this is NOT the same thing! These are gray instead of white, and thin as tissue paper. I haven't had one yet that didn't rip. Now I take out the trash twice a week so that it's nowhere near full, but it still rips from just pulling it out of the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa&Jason

customer_reviews.title: WORST GLAD TRASH BAGS EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am NOT a satisfied customer. I have and am a big fan of the old white with the red ties Glad Bags, I order ahead of time, before I run out. Therefore, that is why this review is so late. I have had to double and sometimes triple these "so-called" super force bags that are thinner and rips easily. I don't know who is evaluating this product so highly, but they maybe had not tried the old regular glad trash bags; which a definitely superior to this over-hyped piece of .... trash.
customer_reviews.author: Lizann 100

customer_reviews.title: The "Febreeze freshness" is migraine inducing
customer_reviews.text: These trash bags smell like they've been doused in men's cologne. No amount of airing them out will diminish the smell. Unfortunately I am now stuck with over 100 of them. If you are even slightly adverse to strong smells, these are not the trash bags for you.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Girl

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting smell
customer_reviews.text: These make the garbage smell like rotting, decaying trash. I don’t know how it makes the garbage smell so much worse. I threw out a garbage can because I thought there was some horrible fungus or something in them, and I realized now with a new trash can that it’s these bags making everything reek. They are disgusting and will not be buying ever again.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Defective: Not the same as in the picture!
customer_reviews.text: I had the same problem as a previous poster— the bag was not as advertised on the box. They are grey and not dual layers as advertised. Probably just a production problem but don’t know that for sure. Amazon was great in providing a refund, but I won’t be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Box very deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same trash bags I usually buy. Same box same wording but not the same bag inside the box. They are cheaper bags, very thin, no smell to them and not durable. I was so shocked when I open the box. Did not not return because I had a house full of company when they were opened and used before I notice the difference in them. I would not recommend these. I also hit the bottom that I wanted new item when ordering these. So there should have been no mistake. So upset.
customer_reviews.author: diane lopez

customer_reviews.title: run small and rip easily
customer_reviews.text: These are super low performing. In the short time that I’ve been using them, I’ve had two bags rip open. Thankfully the worse of it happened outside, but now I’m stuck with about 105 bags that I have no faith in using. Also, despite claiming to be 13 gallons, these bags don’t seem to fill my (13 gallon) barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: My Cat LOVES these bags, use them to get her to do what I want
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are perfectly serviceable garbage bags but the gigantic discovery is that my CAT will do anything to get her paws on this bag. I can only wonder what odorant they use for the bag’s “fresh scent” (ground up mice? Japanese beetle extract?). Whatever it is, it is highly attractive to my cat. So if I want her to come inside or get off the couch, I just wave this bag under her nose and, just like the Pied Piper, she follows it anywhere. It’s the only thing I’ve found that gets her to do what I say. So Hefty People, DON’T change that scent!
customer_reviews.author: mvbagan

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering smell
customer_reviews.text: I received 110 of these and I threw out 110 of these, completely empty, within minutes of opening the box they came in. The smell is staggeringly powerful in no ways that I would describe as "positive". It permeated my skin, my clothes, my apartment, my cat, the air, my soul. Honestly I would pay 10x the $15 I paid just to get someone to make that torture stop. I can't imagine why anyone would want to suppress trash can smells enough to subject themselves to this. I can't recommend avoiding this enough. Unless you enjoy huffing febreeze 24/7. In that case, this is your jam.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bilsky

customer_reviews.title: GLAD? More like ANGRY...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE BAGS! GLAD bags are all we will ever buy, but we have NEVER had this problem! EVERY BAG RIPS DOWN THE SIDE UPON OPENING! There is no durability what-so-ever! Literally can't even use this bag for tissue paper let alone everyday household trash! I have no clue how these are rated 4.5 stars! Are they knock offs? Idk?! The scent isn't the greatest either...feels like my nose hairs are burning. I will be buying GLAD trash bags from the store from now on...I knew the price was too good to be true!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Classic Glad, But Funky Odor Shield Smell
customer_reviews.text: Basically this is a classic Glad product. Which I typically use and like. However, i don't usually buy the odor shield, and after this experience i never will again. The scent Glad trash bags smell is fine and doesn't bother me. And sometimes it is the fragrance's that are nauseating or over-powering. But, for whatever reason, this Odor Shield -Has An Odor!! And it smells very bad to me! This is ironic i realize, but I've got 100 of these things to go through and i have the under the sink in a box and even that is reeking. So, good luck Amazon shoppers! this one is a dud for me though!
customer_reviews.author: iansholidayhouse

customer_reviews.title: these are okay. but not great for us. smell is nice.
customer_reviews.text: seemed to have more poke through than another brand. the other brand (smells like plastic) is only sold at a store we don't drive to often. decided to try these. well, we are buying multiple boxes at the other store to prevent running out in the future. don't hate these, but just think other brand (cheaper) is stronger. these do smell nicer. now, if these keep the animals out of our trash it would be great!. the birds like these bags!
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find the perfect bag for my Hailo trash container (I've had it for 20 years!!). This 13 gallon bag fits perfectly, is very sturdy and I don't have to worry about any leaking. As for a 'strong scent' some other reviewers are mentioning . . . I didn't even know there was supposed to be a scent. I took the first bag out of the box, put it in my trash container, did a little happy dance and now I don't dread changing out the trash bags. Yay! I'll purchase again, no question about that.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness in Question
customer_reviews.text: Having ordered this several times in the past, there have been varying levels of quality. The first version of this we purchased held up very well, we could place the bag in our basic standing trash can with a tight seal, and it would not break a seam. However, this most recent purchase has resulted in about a 1-in-4 failure rate when placing the bag in the receptacle. Only the top-most portion of the seam beaks, and not the entire length of the bag, so we still use them. It's just a little sad to see the tie-string portion of this bag to have gone down in strength.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P.

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE, well-made, and does not leak!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST garbage bags that money can buy. They are very durable, do not leak (well, unless you put a good amount of liquid in there, and poke a few holes in it) - and the scent is an added bonus. We bought these in an effort to get rid of the stinky garbage smell in our kitchen. We switched out our garbage can to a new stainless steel one, put in some carbon strips, and use these garbage bags - and they work well to prevent any bad smells. I'm pleased with this purchase, and would gladly buy them again. The 110 Mega-Pack is priced well, and are absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rigel Janette

customer_reviews.title: Works great at controlling odors
customer_reviews.text: The bags fit perfectly in my kitchen garbage can, they have a nice, fresh smell and have so far controlled the nasty odors that can quickly overpower the kitchen. I compared the price for the same product at a big box store and these were a bit cheaper plus I didn't have to waste gas and time driving to the store. This was a great deal for 110 bags with odor control that were delivered right to my doorstep.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: didnt get what I paid/ordered
customer_reviews.text: I dislike writing a bad review. I didnt get the trashbags I ordered, a differant version of them, leak gaurd and they are very differant from the Force Flex with a scent. They break very easily and while the 13 gallon Force Flex fit my 13 gallon trash can , these do not. My guess is this what didnt work out for Glad, and so we now get the left overs. At least I got trashbags right.
customer_reviews.author: Solfreq

customer_reviews.title: what is that smell?
customer_reviews.text: I knew I was buying scented trash bags and I have used other brands before, but these are truly awful. I can only hope that the box I received had a factory defect or something because it was so overwhelmingly scented with Febreeze that no longer can my nose receive that odor input and not translate it as garbage to my mind. I would rather smell the trash than the overpowering stench of fake-clean that these bags came with. It has dissipated gradually over time, but still quite a knock to the face every time I need to change the trash.
customer_reviews.author: EspressoFox

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily and strong floral smell
customer_reviews.text: The bags ripped every time we used them which was for a week. There was nothing abnormal that we put in the bags or did differently than with our typical trash bag. I didn’t care for the smell either. The scented bags normally don’t bother me one way or other..... it is a plastic bag, I don’t have high expectations. But the smell of these were too strong, fake floral smell. It didn’t stay strong smelling for long but longer than I care for.
customer_reviews.author: a poole

customer_reviews.title: Need trash bags soon... go ahead and order online!
customer_reviews.text: We needed cheap trash bags, so ordered through amazon after finding the best price. We usually buy them at Wal-mart because I cannot seem to find a store cheaper than Wal-mart. So, if you need trash bags, go ahead and buy online. FYI, these are scented and it's a strong scent! Doesn't smell bad, but I generally don't buy things with artificially manufactured scents due to the chemicals they are made up of... but that's all trash bags unless you buy them unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Suthrnbelle

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Scent
customer_reviews.text: I was taken aback when I opened the box and the bags were a grey color with black inside lining. On the front of the box they look white. They feel very thin to the touch. They don’t seem like they have any added leak protection, but they haven’t gotten a hole in them yet. The scent is VERY strong the first few days when you change the bag. Then you either get used to it or it dies off. If you are allergic to strong scents, then do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki J.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these backs a few months back. I re-ordered them but two things, one the size is smaller and the color is gray (not that it even matters). So It does make me feel like wow it's smaller so I would have to be changing it more frequently that's the only negative. Besides that it serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pinzon

customer_reviews.title: Do not get this
customer_reviews.text: The smell (Febreeze scent) of these is so bad I get a headache. Smells really bad. Also they are ugly - not white like the picture. Also the description says "13 Gallon WHITE Trash Bag" . They are not white but are an ugly grey outside and black inside. Refund please.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Glad but I don’t not like these Force Flex bags. I feel like store brands are better than these. Bought these at a steal now am stuck till I’m done with them. Feel like they rip so easy! Almost always getting a hole in them. Very thin. Don’t get why they are “force flex”? More like fall apart? Don’t seem to hold that much as well either. I hate the scent. Hate putting out a new bag. Walmart brand is better than these!!
customer_reviews.author: Gaylon Franks

customer_reviews.title: Not any good
customer_reviews.text: In you product overreview you indicate "TALL GARBAGE BAG: Prevent rips, tears and leaks with LeakGuard plus Glad's unique diamond design allowing these tall trash bags to stretch at the top while reinforced bands contain bulk through the middle". This is not so. When I first read about your product, I was very excited about my purchase. After using only 3 of these "leakguard plus, prevents rips, tears and leaks" advertised bags and having everyone of them tears along the tie area at the top, it really didn't take me long to understand that I had purchased a piece of crap. Well, I only have 107 more to ensure that I don't ever buy from you guys again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Prone to Tearing
customer_reviews.text: The smell is okay, but these are some of the weakest trashbags I have ever used. They are SUPER thin, and as soon as they stretch, they tear. I bought these specifically because they were marketed as being strong and ForceFlex. Definitely would not recommend. I'll use them until they are gone, but I wish I hadn't of wasted my money. On a brighter note, I do like that they aren't see through!
customer_reviews.author: Amber McAlexander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy using these trash bags. They fit our kitchen trash can perfectly. If you have boxes with sharp edges, it can break the bag. However if the bag isn't extremely full, we don't have any issues. The smell of the bags are nice however it doesn't last long. We will keep purchasing though as they are perfect for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Durable but expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality garbage bags no doubt but they are expensive. At the end of the day you stuff it with garbage and throw it away. Much better than the flimsy ones that tear on you but there are some average quality ones that work well as well. I use these when I have a get together or expect guests because it can handle the multiple disposable plates and bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Vyas

customer_reviews.title: These bags are no longer the good quality they once were.
customer_reviews.text: Since they have turned the bags grey there has been a major decrease in quality. With the very first bag used out of this new pack I noticed it gets more holes and rips much more easily. I have used Glad exclusively since I got my very first apartment years ago. Now I will be looking for a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: wills2011

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issues and Smell are terrible now.
customer_reviews.text: Like other recent reviews have stated something has changed with the scent and quality. The sent is horrible and overwhelming now. It was subtle in the past but my last 2 boxes have been horrible. Also they keep tearing now. Both at the top as I stretch over the can and inside when a cardboard box corner gets pushed too hard. Same garbage can for 10+ years and using Glad that entire time. Something has either changed or Amazon got a defective shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This was a disappointment. Other Glad trash bags held up much better than this. The gray colored bags could not carry the weight as well as past purchases. The bags would routinely tear apart at the top where the drawstrings are placed. More than a few times I was forced to re-bag the trash just to get it out the door. Will not purchase this particular brand again.
customer_reviews.author: jenjenkx

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not what pictured. These are black bags, not white. Don't smell as good as what I usually get, which are the force flex febreeze, even though these came up as a buy again suggestion... Amazon issue, not glad issue. Definitely not as sturdy as Force flex. A house guest changed our my bag during a party and doesn't know I'm selective about my bags, so I can't send them back now. Not sure what to do with them. Blah
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Penning

customer_reviews.title: Grey/Black Not White, Quality Lacking
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white, Glad Tall 13 gal trash bags 110ct. with Fresh Clean Febreze scent, however I received grey/black trash bags with no scent. They seem thinner and smaller than the white ones I was supposed to receive. The seams are not as sturdy and tear very easily. Disappointed as these are not the quality Glad trash bags used to have nor what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as another brand
customer_reviews.text: These bags are just ok. I've always used another brand, Hefty, but when that brand was out of stock, I decided to give Glad a try. Unfortunately it didn't turn out so well. The bags were easily ripped wheb I took them out of my trash compactor. I know that my trash compactor is not the best and has some rough edges, but the Hefty bags were rarely, if ever, ripped for some reason. I guess these Glad bags are made for smoother trash cans and not for more heavy duty uses. Maybe my expectation was set too high.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy
customer_reviews.text: The quantity makes this a value buy, but the scent of Febreze is awesome, makes my kitchen smell good, not overwhelming. The strength in the bags gives me confidence in throwing out the trash without any worry of leaks or breakage. Brand is familiar and reliable, so there is not doubt in trusting Glad. Definitely will purchase again and recommending to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: mysticblue50

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful, but tears easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags in a different scent last year and absolutely loved them. These, however, have ripped on a few occasions. It should be fine if you're using for recycling cans or bottles, but trust me from experience - don't stuff any boxes or things with sharp edges in these bags! They tear easily. On the bright side, they smell great! The scent is not too overpowering and you can only smell it when you open the garbage can. It's nice to smell fresh cotton instead of dirty garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: The first order of these trash bags was great so I ordered them again. The second order looked a bit different, but didn’t give it a second thought until this weekend when I realized they were inferior to the others. They rip every time I take them out of the trash can so I end up using 2 bags so they don’t burst before they make it to the outside can. I’m not a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: jlb

customer_reviews.title: Not white bags
customer_reviews.text: As per other reviews, I did not find the scent too strong, actually less than previous purchases. What I did not like is that the bags are not white. The outside is silver and inside black. It's taken some time to get used to throwing our trash into a seemingly "black hole". They'll do.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Berry

customer_reviews.title: Quality bags and huge quantity in pack!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite trash bags! The package has enough for months of trash, and this household goes through A LOT of trash bags! One box from the store last maybe four or five days, and this box lasts me forever! The bags smell amazing, they don’t rip when you pull them out and don’t drip if there is liquid in them. I will forever order these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Destinie Gray

customer_reviews.title: scent is too strong
customer_reviews.text: The bags are odd. I am used to a white bag in the kitchen- these are black. They don't come out of the box as easily as the Glad bags I usually buy- it takes a lot of shaking to get the bag to open for placement in the waste container. The Febreeze smell is really strong and doesn't mask the odor of garlic or onions when they are discarded. I don't think I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jomalley

customer_reviews.title: This  Product  definately  gets  5  stars.....  !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried sooooooooooooo many 13 gal trash bags.... Hefty and so many others and not that they did poorly..... but didn't get a solid 5 star in all areas from me..... this Product .. it the product I will endorse and continue to purchase..... Price is Great !!! Ongoing Odor control Sturdy.... leak proof.... Glad hands down gets a FAR EXCEED on this product from Me !!!!!! ty
customer_reviews.author: PEN

customer_reviews.title: Not White Trash bags anymore
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be holding up okay with ripping - unlike some other customers experiences. I know its purely aesthetic but these bags are light gray on the outside and black on the inside. I really wish they were white like it looks like on the package. Now I am left with 110 black trash bags to use up before I can order a different brand of white ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Really, I was happy to get trash bags. I couldn’t find my regular brand. The scent is okay. Not unpleasant, but not something I’d go out of my way to smell. The bags are so-so. They do tend to get small rips and tears easier than the hefty bags I typically use. They have not totally ripped apart and given out so they are okay. Just not great.
customer_reviews.author: Vie

customer_reviews.title: Every single bag rips down the side.
customer_reviews.text: Update: I got a defective box and every single bag has ripped at the top down the side. And I mean every single bag. I always get a better deal on Amazon when purchasing trash bags in bulk. I started buying these months ago and I love them! They NEVER rip or tear, extend to fit more garbage, smell amazing, and are darker colored so you don't see everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Hallock

customer_reviews.title: Bags break just putting them on the trash can
customer_reviews.text: Most of the bags in this roll have snapped at the corners when trying to put them on the trash can. It's not a trash can issue - if the can was any smaller these bags wouldn't stay on. They bags are just super fragile. Going to try something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Trashy trash bags
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the worst trash bags we have used. They split very easily and end up being useless. We often have to double bag just to be able to close the bag because the strap at the top tore through the ultra thin plastic making the bag unable to close. I will be trying another brand. The only upside to these is the scent does good at masking odors.
customer_reviews.author: FlyLkNEgl

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the value but scent was s
customer_reviews.text: I immediately disliked the scent of these bags. Its not strong but more of a cheap perfume smell. Have me a headache because very small kitchen and bathroom were overwhelmed but after couple of hours it's better. Glad bags are all I buy because they stretch and don't tear. I usually buy the white ones but these are a grey color but do the job. A large box at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: stacy lowery

customer_reviews.title: Right name would be OdorEverywhere
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was happy when I got those bags - they are sturdy, easy to use and inexpensive. The very strong chemical odor was evident from the beginning but I was thinking it will go away. No, it's not. The odor is so unbearable, I have to store those bags in a closed plastic bag. And even one trash bag (on a trash bin) gives so strong CHEMICAL odor that you can notice it in the kitchen and living room. I will never buy them again. (but would be happy to buy non-chemical-odor version)
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Malakhov

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting odor and rips easily
customer_reviews.text: May I never, ever, ever buy this again. Disgusting, very strong, very persistent, overwhelmingly fake chemical floral odor, hangs throughout the room and house after opening a bag. Also tends to rip easily around the drawstring tie band when you try to snug the bag up to close the bag. I bought for the good price and odor shield sounded good, but I will likely throw away before I’ve even used a third of the box, nullifying any economic advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Corglet

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Not what I thought I bought. I had purchased in the past and did a repurchase. These smell horrible, are thin, and each time I try to tie them up, the string breaks. I am trying to send back or get replacement. I loved the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey M Masterson

customer_reviews.title: You Don't Want to Buy These!
customer_reviews.text: These are by the worst trash bags I have ever purchased! To begin with they are over- perfumed to the point that they make me gag. Every single bag I have used has either split at the side seam or the entire drawstring tears taking the top of the bag with it. After a month, I bought new Glad bags that have worked as they should.
customer_reviews.author: DWG816

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. These bags have a decent scent but these trash bags don’t hold much and get holes in them so easily. I am surprised Glad makes such a low quality product. I’m going back to my old store brand trash bag. OK I had several fall apart so changed my review down to one star :-(
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Good Smell and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy the Kirkland brand, as it's a good value. This was in a pinch, and I'm happy with the product. The smell is very pleasant, and it can be smelt in the area around the bin, masking normal trash smell, and the litter smell of the cat box in the same room. It fits in perfectly without stretch, and it's durable. Would buy again, even for a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey P

customer_reviews.title: Worst kitchen bags ever made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought Glad kitchen bags for years, preferring them over Hefty, and had great success with Glad; however, these particular Glad bags are awful. Every single one rips apart at the slightest tug. I wouldn’t give them to an enemy. These are either a knock off or Glad should stop making them. Do yourself a favor and buy a different kind of Glad bags.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Matkovic

customer_reviews.title: You've been warned. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: These are ste a piece of crap. Not only does every bag rip and puntcure they stink. These are crap. I had dollar store bags that were stronger than these. You can double the bags & they still puncture and leak. I am NOT happy. The company failed on this one & I will NEVER buy Glad flimsy, cheap & smelly bags again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hurdle

customer_reviews.title: Not the right scent this time
customer_reviews.text: This is the second or the third time I ordered this item from amazon. It was great in the past, but this time for some reason the scent is awful. It is not what I remembered from previous orders. What’s worse, I ordered another box of lavender scent and I cannot distinguish the scent from these two boxes at all... not sure what happened but disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Garfieldrok

customer_reviews.title: No matter what the price these bags aren’t worth it
customer_reviews.text: The other views giving this item one star are correct. These bags now split at the bottom. A light tug or even when I had the bag less than 1/4 full it ripped completely open at the bottom. These bags are of zero quality now. Stay far far away. Save your money and go with a different brand. Plus I’ve also noticed that the bags have gotten a lot thinner. I have returned my latest delivery of these garbage bags and have stopped my auto delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Swag

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be
customer_reviews.text: The bags have uneven openings for the drawstring, resulting in the bag not fully closing. I've purchased these bags many times over the years. Either the quality control on this lot was bad or the cost cutting has damaged the product quality. These really do suck. Ive had stuff fall out of them. The quality has really gone downhill.
customer_reviews.author: Skibum

customer_reviews.title: Not glad with Glad!
customer_reviews.text: For a trash bag these are exactly that: trash. Although received in January, I used the first one a few days ago and while lifting it from the trash can today, it split horizontally spilling trash onto my kitchen floor. Upon closer inspection of the bag, there appears be a weak horizontal seam approximately 8 inches from the top that appears perforated. 5 other bags that I inspected had the same fault line. These bags are unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality plummeted.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened. Used these in the past and this box, they bags keep ripping at the top when I pull them out of the garbage can. Nothing's inside that's overly heavy, or heavier than it usually is. It's not a single tear either, it's a bunch of shredded tiny holes that expand as I pull. Possibly a manufacture's defect?
customer_reviews.author: Leah Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Easily tear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the forceflex has been a fairly good brand but this version is just terrible. They easily tear and each bag has what looks like a perforation around 1/4 from the top of the bag. I'm using them because I needed the garbage bags but never buying these again
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rivera

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!
customer_reviews.text: These smell so strong that I nearly fainted! I have a sensitive nose, I actually thought these were the normal white bags, but these are purple and black bags and the smell is so strong it is unbelievable! I had to take them out of the trash can. Also, the one in there leaked!! Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.author: L. Short

customer_reviews.title: The worst garbage bags ever!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why they changed the designed on these. They used to be great - now you are better off throwing your trash directly in the trashcan without a bag. It would be an easier clean-up job than the mess that this flimsy bag leaves all over your floor when it inevitably breaks. I have given these bags multiple chances. They are now going in the garbage themselves. I'm done!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Perez-Bennie

customer_reviews.title: Put these directly in your trash (but use a different brand bag or it will rip).
customer_reviews.text: I swear I received an off brand version of this. The first time I put it in my trash can it ripped just lining the can and it’s been downhill from there. These rip ALL THE TIME and we have to take the bag out half full or it’ll break completely. I don’t like to waste but I am throwing these out.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Garbage bags
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white ones several times. The last time, Amazon shipped Gray bags. They are flimsy and tear easily. Pure garbage. I still have half of them left. if you order the white ones and you get these instead, send them back. This is my first negative review since I became an Amazon shopper
customer_reviews.author: Henry Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Nursing home odor. Horrendous.
customer_reviews.text: Febreze has created the most nauseating smell for these trash bags that smells like perfume, powder and urine mixed together, or a nursing home. Horrendous! I had to toss them all.
customer_reviews.author: SundanceMountain

customer_reviews.title: horrible bags, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these bags for years, and the last 2 times I've bought them they have been horrible. They are super thin and rip really easily- just about every time I empty the garbage. I though maybe the first time it was just a bad batch. But clearly they have changed something. These are not cheap either. If I could give no stars I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: ... this package of 110 bags to be a really great deal! I was so tired of buying cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this package of 110 bags to be a really great deal! I was so tired of buying cheap garbage bags and fighting with them in the can and making a mess, so decided to invest in a brand name. The bags are of a very high quality and fit my standard sized kitchen can perfectly with plenty of room so that if something heavy is thrown away the bag doesn't separate from the top and sink to the bottom! I also like the Febreze scent. Since there are 110, I don't have to think about it for a long time :)
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Downgraded
customer_reviews.text: These use to be some really good trash bags. Strong. Lately though, they tear easily near the top. Not the same quality as before. "FlexForce" is now just a marketing ploy. Might as well save some money and buy the cheaper bargain-brand if Glad's quality is on their level now.
customer_reviews.author: lawdog

customer_reviews.title: Something's wrong
customer_reviews.text: What happened to this product? I have bought at least 5 boxes of this exact kind I'd kitchen trash bag. This new box is completely different. The bads a gray outside and black inside, and at least 4 inches shorter than the last 5 boxes. Much thinner too. Not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Trish O

customer_reviews.title: Defective ties on every single bag so far
customer_reviews.text: The entire box must be defective which is a bummer since the return window closed yesterday. Every single bag we have used is defective. The black string at the top of the bag that is used to tie once full, it falls out of the ‘pocket’ it is supposed to be encased in circumferentially. Will be throwing these out and finding a new brand to use.
customer_reviews.author: D.Sandoz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Practical. Value.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because I’ve never used any of this company’s products. I don’t like scented products and I didn’t know how these would perform, especially since I was buying a large number in this box. I was pleasantly surprised and I’m now a big fan
customer_reviews.author: St. James

customer_reviews.title: Not the white plastic trash bag I ordered!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these bags 7 other times. Previously they were as described. This time they are grey and much smaller. I don't know if they changed vendors or not, but the quality does not compare to previous orders
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kormann

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of heavy, wet garbage. I have no problem putting it in these bags. They hold up very well. They have a very strong smell when I take the bags out of the box but they lose it the longer they're in the garbage can. I will continue to purchase these bags and I'd recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: peg ott

customer_reviews.title: LOVE how these smell! Freshens up our kitchen each bag change!
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for years. Tried different ones a couple times and always come back. These ARE the best. They smell amazing. The stretch is great and we never ever have leaks. Our trash can has never even needed to be washed because they have never leaked. Will always buy these. Not worth the hassle to switch to save a couple bucks
customer_reviews.author: KRocque

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags
customer_reviews.text: Bags are nice and strong. They hold up well to our trash practices and have not leaked or torn... Yet. We are able to hold body parts nicely, and when tied properly, do not leak. Trash company picks them up on trash day and never asks questions. Again, very nice bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Edens

customer_reviews.title: The box comes semi open!
customer_reviews.text: I just got them and I no already don’t like that they come open. I mean a little tape hoes along way. The smell isn’t overpowering but maybe because the box has been open for a while before getting here the smell had time to disburse.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Gray bags
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is fine. The febreeze odor is no different than the ones I buy at my local supermarket. BUT the bags are GRAY with BLACK interior. That was not listed anywhere. I was expecting white bags. Other than that they are great bags. No problems as some listed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A

product_meta.title: Glad OdorShield Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, Febreze Fresh Clean
product_meta.description: Kitchens can create some of the messiest situations in the house. Glad guaranteed strength lets you fill each 13-gallon trash bag with confidence. At the top of each bag our unique diamond pattern stretches to prevent rips, where other trash bags often tear due to over-stuffing.
feature_bullets: 13 GALLON WHITE PLASTIC TRASH BAGS: Handle daily kitchen and household demands with Glad’s13 gallon tall garbage bag in a Febreze Fresh Clean Scent

5 DAY ODOR CONTROL: 3-in-1 OdorShield works to trap, lock and neutralize tough odors– eliminate smells in the kitchen and around the house with OdorShield trash bags great for baby diaper and cat litter disposal

TALL GARBAGE BAG: Prevent rips, tears and leaks with LeakGuard plus Glad's unique diamond design allowing these tall trash bags to stretch at the top while reinforced bands contain bulk through the middle
GARBAGE CAN LINER: Glad 13 gallon trash can liners ensure a tight grip on the garbage can making for a simple removal with a quick cinch of the durable drawstring
NOTE: Item is scented and the odor may be strong if you're sensitive to smell. Wide enough to fit containers up to 2 feet (1 ft 11 ¾ inches).

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
